com.vmware.vapi.protocol.server.rpc.http

Interface LifecycleListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    LifecycleManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractServer, TcServer

    public interface LifecycleListener
    Interface that provide common mechanism for life cycle management of tasks and threads.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void shutdown()
      Shutdown the task.
      void shutdownNow()
      Initiate ungraceful shutdown.

    • Method Detail

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
        Shutdown the task. The call to this method should block until the shutdown is complete.

        Shutting down a LifecycleListener that is already shutdown or in the process of shutting down should have no effect.

      • shutdownNow

        void shutdownNow()
        Initiate ungraceful shutdown. The method call should return immediately without blocking until the shutdown completes.

        Shutting down a LifecycleListener that is already shutdown or in the process of shutting down should have no effect.
